TopicTitle: Mods create multiple icons and the game becomes non-responsive

Articles.Content:
I am very new to KSP and I just discovered mods. I installed a few, and soon after I had issues. The icons at the edge of the screen repeated themselves many times and clicking them did not work anymore.

I removed all mods and kept only Kerbal Engineer - 1.1.9.0. After a while playing, the issue happened again, only now the only icon that repeated was the Kerbal Engineer one. I removed the mod and things worked fine, so I thought there was a problem with that mod.

I then installed MechJeb2 and soon after, exactly the same issue happened with the MechJeb icon. The game also became very unresponsive to the point where it was impossible to move ships around.

I removed the mod and things are back to normal.

I'm trying to attach here the Kerbal Engineer and game log files (I couldn't find a log for MechJeb) but I don't see an option to do so.

Can someone please help me figure out why these mods are not working?

What's worries me most is: why this is happening only now?

These Add'Ons are around for years, I don't understand why this problem is happening only now.

Put your logs on a file sharing site (Dropbox, Google docs etc.) and post a link here.

Have you installed mods in the Steam copy of KSP? If you have, don’t- Steam breaks modded KSP all the time. U install all your mods, verify the game files through Steam (right click KSP > properties > local files) and then copy KSP (steamapps/common/Kerbal Space Program) and paste it somewhere else e.g. on your desktop, then put your mods in this new copy instead.
Thanks both. I discovered CKAN, and I used it to check. I was using an older version of the mods that were giving me trouble. I upgraded them and the problem is gone.
